doc.field: Justice Stephen G. Crane papers on the Bernhard Goetz trial and other cases
Justice Stephen G. Crane papers on the Bernhard Goetz trial and other cases
Series II. Clipping and subject files
Series II. Clipping and subject files

Series II contains four distinct groups of material:
Non-Goetz clippings (Box 5, Folders 1–7) People v. Goetz clippings (Box 5, Folders 8–47) People v. Goetz correspondence (Box 6, Folders 1–10) People v. Goetz subject files (Box 6, Folders 11–20, and Box 7, Folders 1–32)
